Reviews.Title: “Basic but good accomodation”

Reviews.Content: looking hotel centre rome reasonable price chose hotel principe amadeus hotel convenient clean basic reception fine clean towels changed day smallish shower cubicle fine people sleep serve hotel staff helpful friendly courteous responded requests reviews criticise street noise didnt night windows double glazed hinged blinds cut sound little louder 0730 onwards wasnt excessive centre rome

Reviews.Title: “Convenient accomodation in Rome”

Reviews.Content: told difficult convenient accomodation rome hotel principe dont expect luxus resting visiting town comfortable bed toilet shower towels changed indeed spacious functional 2 stars breakfast included service staff advising breakfast café front hotel warned prices table expensive prices bar counter ground floor noisy traffic jams belongs rome bring earplugs dont strong sleep air conditioning heating winter minor faults fan bathroom noisy towels thin location foot metro bus restaurants hotel ones rome trastevere advice
